thread.title: Shahid and Alia brings 'Shaandaar' to New Delhi
thread.title_full: Shahid and Alia brings 'Shaandaar' to New Delhi - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shahid and Alia brings 'Shaandaar' to New Delhi
text: New Delhi, Oct 16 (ANI): Bollywood superstars Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt were in the capital to promote their upcoming romantic comedy 'Shaandaar'. The duo that will be seen together for the first time on the silver screen looked all geared up and excited on the occasion. Interacting with media persons on the occasion Kapoor said the response he has got so far has been really good. The Highway actress said it's a fairy tale film based on a destination weeding with a lot of quirk and fun!Directed by Vikas Bahl and produced by Anurag Kashyap and Vikramaditya Motwane the film is slated for a 22 October release.
